name: Air Fryer Pear Crisp for Two
author: France C
summary: Skip the oven and make dessert in your air fryer! Top with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, whipped cream, and/or caramel sauce. The recipe can easily be doubled for larger air fryers.
ingredients: 2 large pear (approx 2 per lb)s pears - peeled, cored, and diced
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 360 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Combine pears, lemon juice, and 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon in a medium bowl
Toss to coat, then divide the mixture between 2 ramekins
Combine oats, flour, brown sugar, and remaining 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon in a small bowl
Mix in softened butter using a fork until mixture is crumbly
Place the ramekins in the air fryer basket and cook until the pears are soft and bubbling, 18 to 20 minutes
